attributes.action: Stop the removal of Bradford Media Museum's artefacts to London.
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this to make the government rethink this. They are taking education away right from under our noses.
attributes.background: They want to remove a lot of the exhibits from Bradford's Media Museum and move them down to a museum in London. I think this will be upsetting to both, the local community and those from further afield.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This decision is the responsibility of the Science Museum Group, which is operationally independent.
